name: Root Access (Aswin Behera)
description:
A game about accessing the root directory of a user. Follow the adventures of Stuffy and Floaty, as they platform and fly through different puzzles across the KaliOS environment, hopefully evading the user, as they go deeper into the system to access the root directory.

Puzzles are centered around computer UI. Think smart or just follow your intuition.

Controls for Stuffy the Square:
Key A = move left Key D = move right Key W, Space = Jump

Controls for Floaty:
Just fly around with the mouse pointer, I guess.
